> LEO PRIME looked over at HYDRAS and then back at the others,
> "Finally!=
" He said. "Let's go this thing started."
> 
> Straightening he to a momeny=
 to look at those present, his optics
> going to each one. "This next stage=
 will probrably be very dangerous,
> to ALL of us." he said, looking at dif=
ferent one, but making sure that
> he got a glance at DINOBOT.
> 
> "We kno=
w that the Dinobot are in here somewhere, but there may be
> other things i=
n here too. Communications will be cut off and we will
> be on our own with=
 no other back up."
> 
> LEO PRIME's powerful gaze continued to scan throug=
h those who were
> present. "Be ready for anything and keep your weapons on=
 full and . .
> . " His gaze fell once again on DINOBOT and then RAT TRAP a=
nd
> QUICKSTRIDE, " . . . and remember who the enemy is. For the moment we
=
> are allies. If we canot work together as a group, then I can assure
> you=
 we will certainly die as one."
> 
> LEO turned to look at the jungle, "Max=
imals . . ." He paused and then
> added, " and Predacons . . . TRANSFORM an=
d ROLL OUT!"
> 
> LEO Shifted to his beast mode, as did SANTON who became a=
n African
> elephant, WINGCALIBER who turned into a bald eagle and the FUZO=
RS who
> turned into various incarnations of partial animals.
> 
> With an =
easy run LEO began to move towards the jungle, obviously
> keeping his sens=
es on high alert.
> 
> WINGCALIBER, NOCTORRO, and AIRHAMMER did the same, b=
ut taking ot the air.
> 


At this point, VICE GRIP and DRILL BIT continued=
 to drill over through the ground in stealth mode, going a bit slower than =
the fliers and ground units, but able to keep up by sound.

What they had t=
he benefit of was hopefully going completely concealed to be an 'ace in the=
 hole' should the Predacons come under attack, to make a quick escape if th=
ey were overwhelmed to retreat through the ground, or to pick off enemy uni=
ts individually via tunnel warfare.

Up in the air, WASPINATOR flew along w=
ith the equipment he was carrying, flanking somewhere behind CRYOTEK to hop=
efully let the larger Predacon serve as a shield.  Of course, this being WA=
SPINATOR in the event of attack any near misses would probably disintegrate=
 him, he woudl be grabbed by CRYOTEK to block a hit, a missed attack or swi=
ng would send him crashing to the ground, etc.

DINOBOT meanwhile ran along=
 on the ground in his TRANSMETAL DINOSAUR mode, not using his rocket booste=
rs for the moment.

And BLACKARACHNIA followed along a ways behind, virtual=
ly invisible in the jungle canopy.
